ec:destErrorCode.ec:description: No orders found for the given order identifier.
Archive Order retrieval is supported only for a MSISDN.
No order details found for the given order identifier
The request does not comply with the XSD schema.
Neither Card Details nor Card Token have been supplied
The Card Token in the request is missing. Please submit the Card Token.
Card Payment Reference Number is missing, Please submit the Card Payment Reference Number.
Store number and Store name not provided in the request
One or more back end services are not available at the moment. Please try again later.
No rows found: Most likely the existing Account could not be found. Please contact service support for help on this.
Order Number Being Processed: An order has already been submitted with the same order details and is either cancelled or in progress.
Order Number Stuck: An order has already been submitted with the same order details and is in progress.
Unique Order Identifier Already Exists. Internal error, unique reference for the order could not be created. Retry as is and if problem persists please contact service support team.
This billing customer is a test customer and no CSA Id set. Please set the CSA Id and resend.
The CSA specified in the order message is not authorized to service billing customer. Please correct and resend.
Missing Customer Number of Legal Entity. Please set legalEntityPartyReference in the orderHeader and resend.
Missing Customer Number of Legal Entity. Please set orderPlacedByPartyReferencein the orderHeader and resend.
The account set data contains more than one billing customer number. Please correct and resend.
Existing account, but no existing account details have been passed. Please correct and resend.
Incorrect details supplied for a new account. No legal entity customer reference has been passed or the passed entry does not correspond to the one in PartySet data. Please correct and resend.
Incorrect details supplied for a new account. No billing customer contact reference has been passed or the passed entry does not correspond to the one in PartySet data. Please correct and resend.
The customer entered as the legal entity for this order has already another order with post pay elements on it which is still in progress.
accountSetReference specified on saleableProducts but not found on the account list. Please correct and resend.
chargeToCrossChargeAccountReference specified on saleableProducts but not found on the account list. Please correct and resend.
Order missing Billing Account ID Details. Post Pay Product but no accountNumber specified in the order line. Please correct and resend.
Invalid combination of prepay and postpay tariffs. The order contains prepay and postpay tariffs in the same order line which is not supported. Please correct and resend.
The order contains duplicate postpay MSISDNs. Please correct and resend.
One of the postpay MSISDNs supplied on a New order has been used in a previous Order. Please correct and resend.
The order contains duplicate postpay SIMs. Please correct and resend.
The postpay SIM sent in the order is invalid. Please correct and resend.
One of the postpay SIMs supplied on the order is already active, or is part of an existing Order or Service Request. Please correct and resend.
The order contains duplicate prepay MSISDNs. Please correct and resend.
One of the prepay MSISDNs supplied on a New order has been used in a previous Order. Please correct and resend.
The order contains duplicate prepay SIMs. Please correct and resend.
One of the prepay SIMs supplied on the order is already active, or is part of an existing Order or Service Request. Please correct and resend.
Make and Model for Handsets are mandatory and need to be sent in the order. Please correct and resend.
Failed to find the postpay tariff for the given product id. Please contact service support for help on this.
The postpay tariff in the order has no corresponding postpay sim in the same order line. Please correct and resend.
Failed to find the TAM tariff for the given product id. Please contact service support for help on this.
Failed to find the POI tariff for the given product Id. Please contact service support for help on this.
Failed to map the billing customer number to an internal Billing customerID. Please contact service support for help on this.
Either the current, previous or oldest address specified does not contain the country or post code. Please correct and resend.
The delivery address specified does not contain either the country, post code. Please correct and resend.
The address validation status for either the current, previous or oldest address is missing. Please correct and resend.
The address validation status for either the current, previous or oldest address is not known. Please contact service support for help on this.
There was an error retrieving the payment type by name GENEVA for recurring payments. Please contact service support for help on this.
There was an error retrieving the payment method for the specified card type in the recurring payment's credit card details. Please contact service support for help on this.
There was an error retrieving the payment type by name BANK for recurring payments. Please contact service support for help on this.
There was an error retrieving the payment type by name CHEQUE for recurring payments. Please contact service support for help on this.
The payment method for the specified card type in one-off credit card details is not recognised. Please contact service support for help on this.
One Off Payment Name GENEVA Not recognised. Please contact service support for help on this.
Chargeable Delivery Option is selected in the order but no delivery details associated. Please correct and resend.
There was an error retrieving the Delivery Timeslot Details. Please contact service support for help on this.
There was an error retrieving the Insurance Duration Details. Please contact service support for help on this.
The Insurance Duration Details retrieved is not valid. Please contact service support for help on this.
No Insurance Duration Details found for the given product Id. Please contact service support for help on this.
A Party set reference is missing from the PartySet list. Please correct and resend.
There was an error retrieving the payment method for the specified card type in the one-off credit card details. Please contact service support for help on this.
CCA Number is specified on saleable product, but not found in the list of CCA Details.
Submission of only New order is currently supported. Please select orderType as NE and resend.
The number of products ordered has exceeded the maximum allowed for this channel.
At least one product is required for an order to be placed.
Invalid Request. Please check the input and resubmit.
Archive Order retrieval is supported only for a MSISDN.
One or more back end services are not available at the moment. Please try again later.
Internal service error has occurred.
Service call timed out. Please try again later.
Backend system error has occurred.
Unknown/Uncaught error has occurred.
Invalid Request. Please check the input and resubmit.
One or more back end services are not available at the moment. Please try again later.
Internal service error has occurred.
Backend system error has occurred.
Service call timed out. Please try again later.

Backend system error has occurred.
Backend database error has occurred.
Postpay MSISDN is not active in Companion.
Postpay MSISDN already in Upgrade
Customer Number provided is not found in Companion.
Partner value unknown to Companion.
In Accessory section, risk value must also be passed when dispatcher details are given.
In Adjustment section, the adjustmentReason value is not recognized.
Delivery options must be populated if chargeableDeliveryOption is passed.
In Handsets section, risk value must also be passed when dispatcher details are given.
The postpay Insurance product id provided is not found in the system.
Invalid SSN (SIM serial number) passed in the postpay SIM section.
The SSN (SIM serial number) provided in the postpay SIM section is not found in the system.
The SSN (SIM serial number) value provided in the postpay SIM section is already active against another MSISDN.
The SSN (SIM serial number) value provided in the postpaySIM section is already present in another active order.
The product id given in postpay tariff section is not found in the system.
The product id given in the tariff modifiers of the postpay tariff section is not found in the system.
Payment authorisation response code passed is not recognised.
Delivery details missing. This must always be provided when either standardDeliveryCharge or chargeableDeliveryOption is provided.
No account found for MSISDN with respect to payment details
In chargeableDeliveryOption section, the timeslot value provided is not recognized.
The MSISDN to be upgraded not found in the system.
Payment details: settlementResponse code passed is not known to Companion.
Duplicate order number.Please check the input & resubmit.
At least one of handset, postPayTariff or adjustment sections must be present in the input.
standardDeliveryCharge flag not set to Y even though standardDeliveryCharge section has been provided in the input
Early Upgrade reference provided has already been used on another Upgrade order.
Early Upgrade reference number missing in input.
Early Upgrade Reference number not found in the system.
Early Upgrade Reference number has expired.
Early upgrade fee does not match the value that the user is entitled for.
The postpay tariff provided is not allowed as it is a member of a tariff family that is currently excluded from early upgrade.
EarlyUpgrade fee missing in input, although earlyUpgrade is being taken.
Neither card details nor the card token details have been provided in the input.
CCA Number is specified on saleable product, but not found in the list of CCA Details.
There has been a problem looking up the recurring payment type in the database.
Invalid request. Please check the input and resubmit.
Upgrade Entitlement Reference does not exist. This should match a reference number passed back by the upgrade entitilement service.
The Upgrade Entitlement specified in the request has expired.
FAILED: The upgrade order fails to meet the conditions of the customer's upgrade entitlement. Reasons for failure are:
This Upgrade request is not entitled to submit Upgrade Orders with a CCA Settlement. The CCA settlement has to be done prior to submitting upgrade order.
The requesting application is not entitled to submit upgrade orders which are Fast Track Upgrades
The requesting application is not entitled to override this upgrade order.
The requesting application cannot place an upgrade to a CCA tariff unless they have the authority to use the override flag and have set it on the order.
The requesting application cannot place an upgrade to a handset tariff unless they have the authority to use the override flag and have set it on the order.
The requesting application cannot place a request to upgrade to a handset tariff
The requesting application cannot place a request to upgrade to a CCA tariff
The requesting application cannot place a request to upgrade to a SIM only tariff unless they have the authority to use the override flag and have set it on the order.
The requesting application cannot place a request to upgrade to a SIM only tariff.
The MSISDN to be upgraded has an active CCA that has not being paid off in the order.
Card token information is missing.
Card payment reference number is missing.
The product Id is missing for the account adjustment.
The product name is missing for the account adjustment.
The reason for account adjustment is missing.
External Payment Id is missing.
Store number and Store name not provided in the request.
